text: The Theory of Everything is a 2014 British biographical romantic drama movie directed by James Marsh. It is about the life of the theoretical physicist Stephen Hawking. The movie was based on Jane Hawking's memoir Travelling to Infinity: My Life with Stephen. The movie's score was composed by Jóhann Jóhannsson. The movie stars Eddie Redmayne, Felicity Jones, Charlie Cox, Emily Watson, Simon McBurney, Christian McKay, Harry Lloyd, and David Thewlis. The movie was released on 7 September 2014 at the Toronto International Film Festival and released in the United Kingdom on 1 January 2015 to strong positive reviews. ==References== Category:2014 romantic drama movies Category:2010s biographical movies Category:British biographical movies Category:British romantic drama movies Category:Japanese romance movies Category:Japanese drama movies Category:Japanese biographical movies Category:Movies set in the 1960s Category:Movies set in the 1970s Category:Movies set in the 1980s Category:2010s English-language movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies about educators Category:Movies about physicists Category:Movies about mathematics Category:Movies based on biographies
title: The Theory of Everything (2014 movie)
